General.Name: S H Kelkar and Company Limited
General.Description: S H Kelkar and Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and supplies fragrances, flavors, and aroma ingredients in India. Its fragrances are used in personal care, hair care, skin care and cosmetic, fabric care, and home care products, as well as in fine fragrances; and flavors are used in dairy, beverage, baked, bakery, beverages, and pharmaceutical products. The company markets its products under the SHK, Cobra, Three Birds, Auris, Wheel, and Keva brand names to national and multi-national FMCG companies, blenders of fragrances and flavors, and its producers. It also exports its products. S H Kelkar and Company Limited was founded in 1922 and is based in Mumbai, India.
General.Address: Lal Bahadur Shastri Marg, Mumbai, India, 400080
